name: Nirwana Beach and Resort
detail: We stayed at totally five different hotels in Bali, and the Nirwana was by far the best of them. Its really nice situated right by the sea and the view is breathtaking. There are only few rooms, so the area, restaurant and pool are never crowded. There are many nice things to wee nearby by taxi or motorbike. The hotel offers a good transport service. The restuurant is a bit pricy, but its worth it!

name: Tonys Villas & Resort
detail: The only best thing about the property is the pool and area

name: Nikhila Seminyak
detail: I live in bali now.been here as a tourist 30 times this place is the best value for money. $30 a night gets you a 4 atar quality bed..clean has no fridge..location is great...Wont find a place for this price with a decent bed in bali..

name: Villa Kayu Raja
detail: Well after 10 years living in Perth, W.A this was my 1st ever trip to Bali. My booking for flights and accommodation were let a little to the very last minute so prices were slightly higher than one would normally expect to pay. Having said that I was certainly not disappointed with my final choice in accommodation. Both myself and my elderly mother decided to book a 2 bedroom villa with a private pool. On first impression we were both extremely impressed with the share size of our rooms both with personal ensuites, plasma screens, huge beds and probably enough room for another bed if you really wanted to push it. And that was just the bedrooms. Ground floor with a pool that is half underneath the lounge floor. In a nutshell the 2 bedroom 3 level Villa was extremely spacious and probably more room than we required for only 2 people. The staff from reception to front of house to the restaurant to the Kitchen to the cleaners, pool men, Massage therapists even to the guards at the front gate enterance were all absolutely amazing, friendly, helpful and extremely curtious and always greeted you with a smile. The only 2 things I could pick up on was: 1. the lack of sun hitting the pool area. A bit picky and even the staff mentioned this to me. But without tearing down the Villas and trying to start again from stratch or somehow repositioning the sun itself there's not a lot the Villa Staff can help you with here. 2nd The location, a bit of a double edged sword here, it's probably a litte further out of Seminyak than you would like if you wanted to save on Taxi fares or save your feet. Having said that you are just that far enough to be on the edge of Seminyak hence away from the bulk of the main street 24/7 noise. It all really comes down to who you are and what you are after either as an individual or as a group. Outside of the above 2 things I had an amazing time at Villa Kayu Raja and I can not thank all the staff enough for their hospitality and premier servi

name: Chapung Sebali Resort
detail: chapung se bali villas are a truly wonderful experience. the resort is small but luxurious. the villas are large and well equiped. positioned on a ridge overlooking a valley with lush vegetation and rice paddies the views are amazing. each villa with its own pool is designed for complete privacy and it is generally so quiet you are not even aware of the other guests at the resort except for at mealtimes. the staff are very friendly and helpful and make an effort to get to know you by name. we really enjoyed our time at chapung se bali villas and would definitely consider going again. the one downside is that the resort is some distance from ubud. there is a free shuttle that operates regularly which is very convenient but this probably isn't the best place to stay if you want to be easily accessable to the shops, bars and restaurants of ubud. the location is also an advantage though because it means there is no traffic noise and you are away from the hustle and bustle. come here, settle in and enjoy a few days of privacy, peace and quiet and indulgence.

name: Pandawa All Suite Hotel
detail: The best trip in Bali so far (been more than 10 times). The location far from the crowd so that is very good for people who like peaceful area. Once I got there, the staffs are very professional, even the security guard. I asked him if I can rent a scooter and he provide it just in 10 minutes. The receptionist was a trainee at that time, but she also look professional. The room is not just huge, clean, and tidy. Even though you won't see panoramic view, but the price is absolutely overly cheap. I recommend this hotel for budget travelers with high quality hotel

name: Kamini Legian Hotel
detail: We had book 3 Room for 3 night , this is the same complaint as per below : 1. Air-conditioning inside the room ,filled with incorrect location,Lying in the bed, totaly cannot feel the cool air . Is hot at the night. 2. Water Heater is Unstable ; Suddenly cold suddenly hot; 3.Because the aircon is not cold, so we had inform counter we no need room service and we keep the aircon open until we back. But once we back hotel , someone had go inside our room and close all the power supply, our room like sona .they didn't get our approve just simple go inside our room , this position we cannot except. 4.Hotel include breakfast, but the hotel restaurant is without aircon or fan. their breakfast is only 2 bread with butter + coffee or tea only .

name: Munduk Moding Plantation
detail: Wooooooow!!! Even better than it looks in pictures! Don’t judge the outside entrance at all. Vehicles are not allowed through the property so we got dropped off in the front entrance. From the entrance, we got driven with our luggage into the actual villa. We were welcome with some amazing tea and a homemade lei made out of real flower straight from their plantation! From then on, the next two nights were just too magical. We stayed for two nights and didn’t even want to leave! We felt so relaxed. The service were amazing: probably the best service ever! We had Leo to help us out with everything we needed and we could not have been happier. He made sure we were always comfortable and was our private driver from the waterfall! The food here are so on point especially the breakfast for me! We booked an hour appointment with the spa on the first day and enjoyed it so much that we had to book one of their 4 hour package spa deal on the next day. Talk about relax! Amazing service, relaxing spa, gorgeous views, quiet villa- what is there not to enjoy? I would definitely want to come back here next time we come back to Bali and would definitely love to stay longer. Thank you Munduk Moding Plantation for everything that you have done for us to make our honeymoon amazing!

name: Adi Dharma Hotel Kuta
detail: We stayed in Adi Dharma hotel for two nights from April 28-30. This was the first time we visited Bali and stayed in Adi Dharma hotel. We had a fantastic experience! I can say, which I mean it, Adi Dharma hotel is the best hotel I've ever stayed! It has nice location, great facilities, and excellent service. We appreciated the friendly staffs and excellent service! We arrived at the hotel at around 9am, the hotel was nice enough to schedule us a room for early check-in. The hotel also provided car and driver in a competitive price. The staffs were very friendly and helpful. We booked a car to Ubud for a one day trip, but we left a baggage at the car. We didn't think of it in the last day we were in Bali when we packed our luggage to airport. At that time we've already checked out and in another hotel in Nusa Dua. We contacted Adi Dharma hotel to see if we can go to pick up, unfortunately the car was out for a trip with other guests, they would be back after 6pm, but our flight was at 8:30pm. The staff told us time would be too tight, and they were worried we would miss the flight because we needed to be in the airport 2 hours in prior to the flight. At last, they offered to send a car to deliver our baggage to the airport for us. At 6:30pm, we met the driver from the hotel and got out bag back before the flight at the airport. We were thrilled and moved by the service. Thanks so much for their help! We could never imagine a hotel would be so considerate and customer oriented.

name: Pradha Villas Seminyak
detail: It was very enjoyable and convenient to the shops near Seminyak Square. Nearby Grocer & Grind, Cool Spa Salon (cheap massages), Ultimo restaurant is nearby. The best part about staying at Pradha was their service. We had originally made 2 bookings, 1st one for 3 days in a 1 bed room villa, and 2nd one after for 2 bed rooms when our couple friend was coming to Bali to meet with us. They staff actually gave us a 2 bedroom villa, locking up one of the bedrooms, so that we didn't have to move when they arrived.
